name: Estuary Province
role_in_state: Primary salt-reagent supplier and navigational-augury gateway
culture_adjustments: stronger Riveric Dialect influence on coastal speech
augur households hold greater civic authority
tide-anchored ancestor rites emphasize estuarine voyages
guild-run quay-justice often overrides port-patronage norms
constraints: soft, flood-prone soils limit heavy industry
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
navigational auguries cannot replace charts or seamanship
notes: critical supplier of state salt and reagent inputs
guilds tightly regulate augur access and quay rights
ports clustered on levees and raised causeways
